## PreflightTest.on() method

Sample event. Raised when the PreflightTest has generated a stats sample during the test.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
on(sampleEvent: PreflightTest.Event.Sample, listener: PreflightTest.Listener.Sample): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  sampleEvent | [PreflightTest.Event.Sample](./voice-react-native-sdk.preflighttest_namespace.event_enum.md) | The raised event string. |
|  listener | [PreflightTest.Listener.Sample](./voice-react-native-sdk.preflighttest_namespace.listener_namespace.sample_typealias.md) | A listener function that will be invoked when the event is raised. |

<b>Returns:</b>

this

- The PreflightTest object.
